title: "All that is solid melts into air..."
content:
I saw this on reddit this morning, thought I would share:

[http://www.behance.net/Gallery/Todo-lo-sAlido-(all-that-is-solid-melts-into-air)/143086](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820073720/http:/www.behance.net/Gallery/Todo-lo-sAlido-(all-that-is-solid-melts-into-air)/143086)

From [this designer.](http://web.archive.org/web/20130820073720/http:/www.jjjolll.com/)
author: greyjay

comments.content: Fab! I wonder if we’ll see an increase in these DIY/Sagmeister-esque projects, with corporate funding, in coming years as marketers keep struggling to find any way to cut through the noise and actually reach consumers.
